mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS( USER_SEQ, USER_ID, PASSWORD, USER_NAME, BIRTH, PHONE) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(USER_SEQ),0)+1 FROM USERS AS SUB) , #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{birth}, #{phone} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, BIRTH, PHONE, NICK_NAME, STATUS_MESSAGE, (SELECT CONCAT(SAVE_FILE_PATH,SAVE_FILE_NAME) FROM FILES WHERE FILE_SEQ=IMG_SEQ) AS IMAGE_URL, (SELECT CONCAT(SAVE_FILE_PATH,SAVE_FILE_NAME) FROM FILES WHERE FILE_SEQ=BACKGROUND_IMG_SEQ) AS BACKGROUND_IMG FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET IMG_SEQ=#{imageUrl} WHERE USER_SEQ=#{userSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT SAVE_FILE_PATH, SAVE_FILE_NAME, FILE_NAME FROM USERS A, FILES B WHERE A.IMG_SEQ=B.FILE_SEQ AND USER_SEQ=#{userSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET STATUS_MESSAGE=#{statusMsg} , NICK_NAME=#{nickName} WHERE USER_SEQ=#{userSeq}
